name: Nature's Garden Organic Trail Mix Snack Packs - Trail Mix Variety, Energy Boosting, Heart Healthy, Omega-3 Rich, Cranberries, Pumpkin Seeds, Individual Packs, Family - 1.2 Oz Bags (48 Individual Servings)
short_description: TOP SHELF INGREDIENTS. All Nature’s Garden products, including our nut and trail mix variety packs are made with certified organic ingredients of the highest quality. So rest assured, when you buy Nature’s Garden, you’re buying the absolute best.

FREE FROM NASTIES. We’ve ditched the bad stuff and are committed to bringing you that good good. Each mix inside our Organic Trail Mix Snack Pack is free from preservatives, trans fats, GMOs, artificial ingredients, artificial flavors, cholesterol, and sodium. Whew! Take a big exhale and chow down without second guessing.

FOR EVERY DIET. Did someone say yummy for all? Say goodbye to selective snacking and hello to savvy snacking, with trail mixes designed for everyone to enjoy! Each trail mix inside our Organic Trail Mix Snack Packs are proudly vegan, dairy-free, and gluten-free.

WALLET-FRIENDLY. How do you make a totally delicious, insanely nutritious, and crazy convenient snack even better? Buy in bulk and make it budget-friendly! Our Organic Trail Mix Snack Packs come in a bulk bundle of 48 individual 1.2oz (34g) packets featuring three of our best-selling trail mixes. The perfect way to indulge in a variety of yummy, for less.

KICKSTART YOUR HEART. Each of the trail mixes inside our Organic Trail Mix Snack Packs proudly wear the healthy heart banner. This means that you can munch guilt-free, knowing you’re treating your heart (and soul) to a snack with a greater purpose.
product_description: For those busy days on the go or slow afternoons at the office. To toss in your kids’ lunch boxes or for your next outdoor adventure. Make Nature’s Garden Organic Trail Mix Snack Packs your go-to for savvy snacking on the move. This bag includes 48 individual 1.2oz (34g) packets of our best-selling fruit and nut trail mix including our Heart Healthy Mix, Omega-3 Deluxe Mix, and Cranberry Health Mix. These convenient snack packs feature the highest quality organic ingredients to keep your energy high and belly full throughout your busy day. Each packet contains a harmony of fruits, nuts, and seeds, featuring almonds, walnuts, pistachios, pecans, pumpkin seeds, and cranberries. Cranberries help fight against disease with their antioxidant benefits, while the nuts and seeds work to help maintain a healthy heart, filled with omega-3 fatty acids. High in fiber, protein, and a rich list of vitamins and minerals, nut and trail mix variety packs work to enrich the body and mind. And with certified organic ingredients in every packet, feel good knowing you’re giving your body the best. Get your hands on a bag of these snack packs to keep you and your family moving and grooving!

name: PLANTERS NUT-rition Wholesome Nut Mix, 7.5 oz Box (Contains 7 Individual Pouches) - Cashews, Almonds and Macadamias Snack Mix - No Artificial Flavors, No Artificial Colors, No Preservatives - Kosher
short_description: MIXED NUTS: PLANTERS Mixed Nuts consist of peanuts, almonds, cashews, hazelnuts and pecans
PLANTERS NUTS: This 27 ounce resealable jar of PLANTERS Mixed Nuts contains about twenty-seven 1 ounce servings and features a resealable lid designed to lock in long-lasting freshness
ROASTED MIXED NUTS: These roasted mixed nuts are enhanced with sea salt
LESS THAN 50% PEANUTS: Each canister of mixed nuts contains less than 50% peanuts measured by weight
Allergen information: walnut
product_description: PLANTERS NUT-RITION Nut Mix offers a convenient and tasty solution for those seeking nut snacks that provide both energy and satisfaction. Comprised of cashews, almonds, and macadamia nuts, these mixed nuts individual packs offer a great option as part of a balanced diet. These protein snacks are lightly roasted and flavored with sea salt to enhance the natural taste, making them great as adult snacks or for those long road trips. These nuts individual packs are ideal protein snacks for hiking adventures or as office snacks to keep you productive throughout the day. Enjoy these nut mix packs as snack packs, providing a delicious source of eight essential vitamins and minerals. Perfect for anyone looking for diet snacks or snack options, these mixed nuts are a great choice for salty snacks that don't sacrifice nutrition. Stash them in your car as road trip snacks or consider them as snacks for stocking stuffers. Whether it's for after school snack time or single serve snacks on the go, PLANTERS NUT-RITION Nut Mix is a versatile choice designed to fit your busy lifestyle. name: Emerald Nuts Cashews and Almonds with Dried Pineapple 7 Ct (1-Pack), 100-Calorie Individual Packs of Mixed Nut Blend and Dried Fruit
short_description: 100-CALORIE PACKS: Emerald's Cashews & Almonds with Dried Pineapple 100-Calorie Packs are an irresistible trio! Deliciously crunchy nuts mixed with the sweet goodness of dried pineapple fruit pieces, these individually portioned snacks bring layers of flavor.
ONLY THE GOOD STUFF: We source only the tastiest, highest-quality nuts! They are Kosher Certified, non-GMO, and contain no artificial flavors or synthetic colors.
A NUTRITIOUS CHOICE: Whole almonds, cashews and dried pineapple help fuel your day! Nuts and dried fruit are the ideal on-the-go, ready-to-eat, travel-friendly snack for kids and adults.
TAKE THEM TO GO: Convenient individual packs easily fit in a lunch box, backpack, or purse, meaning you can satisfy your nut craving wherever your day takes you.

NUTTY SATISFACTION: Our secret is in our distinct taste that each nut provides. Bring these along for a snack or lunch at work, school or home! Great for snacking, these are a must-have for the pantry!
product_description: At Emerald were nuts about providing you with high-quality and delicious nuts. Irresistible cashews and almonds mixed with the sweet goodness of dried pineapple pieces, these individually portioned snacks bring layers of flavor. This 100-calorie nut mix is a satisfying go-to snack. And because you don't always have time to stop for a satisfying snack our 100-calorie packs are great for your on-the-go lifestyle. Emerald sources only the tastiest highest-quality nuts. Our secret is in our distinct flavor that each nut provides. Whatever the occasion Emerald has the specific nut you are looking for. Since it's non-GMO, Kosher Certified, and contains no synthetic colors, it's a snack you'll feel good about!

name: Kar’s Nuts Sweet ‘N Salty Trail Mix, 2 oz Pouch (Pack of 72), Gluten-Free Trail Mix Snack
short_description: TRAIL MIX SNACKS: Satisfy your cravings with Kar’s Nuts Sweet ‘N SaltyTrail Mix. Includes (72) 2 oz pouches for ultimate freshness, making it a perfect sweet and salty trail mix for travel, lunchboxes, and on-the-go snacking.

SWEET ’N SALTY: This trail mix blends roasted and lightly salted peanuts, naturally sweet raisins, cocoa gems, and crunchy sunflower kernels for a perfectly balanced sweet and salty snack that satisfies every craving.

GLUTEN-FREE GOODNESS: This Kar’s Nuts trail mix is proudly gluten-free, with no hydrogenated oils or trans fats, & is Kosher certified. Enjoy a feel-good snack that is crafted with quality ingredients for you and your family.

STAYS FRESH, EASY TO ENJOY: This conveniently packaged nut trail mix in bulk leaves you satisfyingly full while delivering indulgent taste. Perfect for offices, road trips, concessions, or anytime you want a high-energy trail mix that keeps you fueled.

KAR’S NUTS – AMERICA’S FAVORITE: Born in Detroit in 1933, Kar’s Nuts pioneered the Sweet ‘N Salty Mix & remains the MVP of trail mix. We transform the way people snack with blends inspired by universally loved flavor combinations, crafted to satisfy.
product_description: Satisfy your hunger with Kar’s Nuts Sweet ‘N Salty Trail Mix, a delicious gluten-free trail mix snack crafted with quality ingredients you can feel good about. Bring your energy into balance! Kar’s Nuts Sweet 'N Salty Mix features a blend of gently roasted and lightly salted peanuts, naturally sweet raisins, cocoa gems and sunflower kernels. These nuts snack packs satisfy every mood and deliver a perfect Kar’s Sweet ‘N Salty trail mix experience. Kar’s Nuts, America’s Favorite trail mix brand, has been crafting tasty nut snacks in favorite flavor combinations since 1933. Our convenient 2 oz pouch keeps your snack fresh and ready for travel, offices, kids’ lunches, or on-the-go snacking. Enjoy this Sweet ‘N Salty trail mix knowing it is free of hydrogenated oils and trans fats, gluten-free, and Kosher certified. Whether you’re seeking a high-energy snack for your busy lifestyle or an indulgent trail mix that delivers on taste, Kar’s Sweet ‘N Salty Trail Mix is your go-to. Pioneering the Sweet 'N Salty Mix movement, we've led the way in transforming how America snacks — and America agreed.

short_description: SAHALE SNACKS GLAZED MIXES – Our gourmet snacks are exceptional combinations of premium, dry-roasted, lightly glazed nuts, dried fruits, and spices, each reﬂecting a beautiful location, culture, or culinary tradition somewhere in the world

GLAZED NUT MIX VARIETY PACKS – Our nut variety snack packs include Four of our Glazed Nut Mixes so you can get a taste of each; (3) Maple Pecans, (3) Pomegranate Pistachios, (3) Honey Almonds, and (3) Pomegranate Vanilla Cashews
WHOLE NATURAL INGREDIENTS - We travel the world to source the best ingredients, in their simplest form - which are always deliciously non-GMO, Kosher, and Certified Gluten-Free

GRAB & GO POUCHES – Our 1.5 oz mixed nuts, in individual packs, are perfect for elevating your snacking experience whether you’re on an epic hike, looking for a pick-me-up at work, or curbing hunger during after school errands (18 nut snack packs included)

SNACK BETTER - At Sahale Snacks, we believe every bite should grab your attention - and take everyday snacking Beyond Ordinary; we make it possible with mouthwatering layers of ﬂavor and texture, crafted from only the highest-quality ingredients

The deluxe nut mix variety packs feature (3) Maple Pecans, (3) Pomegranate Pistachios, (3) Honey Almonds, and (3) Pomegranate Vanilla Cashews for a total of 12 sweet and salty mixes. Enjoy these convenient, ﬂavorful, and nutritious nut mixes no matter where the day takes you. At Sahale Snacks, we believe that everyday snacking can, and should, be better. We believe every bite should grab your attention. We exist to craft snacks and moments that go Beyond Ordinary. That's why we offer products that are layered with delicious tastes and textures and use the most ﬂavorful, highest quality, and purest ingredients. Snack Better.

name: FRUIT NUT MIX TRAIL MIX by PREMIUM ORCHARD - Gourmet Trail Mix Bulk Blend of Mixed Nuts & Dried Fruit - Healthy Vegan Snacks, Snack Nut Mix, Plant Protein Source, Non-GMO, Natural - 18oz
short_description: ✅ MIXED NUTS: Healthy snacks for adults & kids are a Premium Orchard speciality! This high energy trail mix is balanced with earthy flavors from peanuts, almonds, pumpkin seeds, walnuts, & pistachios, all dry roasted to a lightly salted crunch.

✅ MIXED FRUIT: Nature's natural fruit tastes like candy. The dried fruit trail mix includes dried pineapple chunks, papaya chunks, dried cranberries & raisins. The all natural sweet & chewy fruit is a perfect complement to the nuts!

✅ NUTRITIOUS: While these components check the box as good plant protein snacks, the mixture also provides a wide range of nutrients, including antioxidants; healthy fats; dietary fiber; C, E, and B vitamins; & potassium, magnesium, and iron.

✅ RESEALABLE PACKAGE: The advantage of dried fruits and nuts trail mix in bulk vs. trail mix in individual packs is: more content for you dollar, and less plastic! Our resealable package keeps your snack mix fresh after opening. This mix is versatile and goes great in morning oatmeals, yogurt, cereal or whatever you want! It's super versatile and goes with everything.

✅ QUALITY: Our Premium Orchard products abide by top standards of quality, consistency, and specialty. We are Kosher and HACCP certified. Quality is our primary commitment. We guarantee freshness and proudly present each healthy snack product.

name: Orchard Valley Harvest Active Snack Pack Mix, 1oz Bags (Variety Pack of 30), Antioxidant Mix, Cranberry Almond Cashew, Omega-3 Trail Mix, Healthy Snacks for Adults and Kids, Gluten Free
short_description: Contains 30, 1 oz bags of three popular Orchard Valley Harvest flavors in a variety pack of Antioxidant Mix (10 bags), Cranberry Almond Cashew Trail Mix (10 bags), and Omega-3 Mix (10 bags) which are delightful treats between meals or as on-the-go snacks

Antioxidant trail mix is a delicious tangy-salty medley of nuts, seeds and fruits including almonds, dried sweetened cranberries and blueberries, cashews, and pepitas that satisfies snack craving while providing an excellent source of vitamin E

Cranberry Almond Cashew trail mix is a sweet and salty blend of fruits and nuts including dried sweetened cranberries with roasted and salted almonds and cashews that takes the edge off your appetite with perfectly sized snacks

Omega-3 trail mix is a mingling of tangy fruits and premium nuts including walnuts, dried sweetened cranberries, almonds, and pistachios that is an excellent source of ALA Omega-3 and offers a fresh, crisp, and flavorful taste
All three varieties of trail mix individual packs are gluten free, contain no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives, and are Non-GMO Project verified
Indulge in the snacks that give back as Orchard Valley Harvest is dedicated to helping stop food insecurity, committing one percent of OVH’s proceeds to tackle child hunger across America
product_description: There’s something special about visiting an orchard to pick delicious snacks straight from trees. Getting to an orchard may not be as easy for you as it is for us. Treat yourself to the next best thing – Orchard Valley Harvest. Just as Mother Nature intended. Orchard Valley Harvest is dedicated to finding pure and simple nuts and dried fruits that support your healthy lifestyle. Our products come right from Mother Nature and do not contain any artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. Add our Active Mix to your buy box and enjoy a variety of delicious flavors that will please the entire family.
